id.description: Unique ID assigned to the company attribute.

admin_id.description: The ID of the admin user associated with the company.

api_writable.description: Indicates whether the field is writable through the API.

archived.description: Flag to indicate if the company data is archived.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the company data was created.

custom.description: Custom attribute specific to the company.

data_type.description: Type of data stored in the attribute field.

description.description: Description or details about the company attribute.

full_name.description: Full name associated with the company.

label.description: Label or display name for the company attribute.

model.description: Model or schema used for storing the company attribute.

options.description: Available options or values for the company attribute.

type.description: Type of data structure for the company attribute.

ui_writable.description: Indicates whether the field is writable through the UI.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the company data was last updated.

messenger_writable.description: Indicates whether the field is writable through the messenger.
